languages.text: Без усмешки выслушал Неумирающий дерзкие слова Домин, ибо тот, кто шутит со Смертью — шутит лишь раз.
The Undying One listened to the Domin's brazen words without a hint of a smile; for one who taunts Death can do so but once.
languages.original_text: Без усмешки выслушал Неумирающий дерзкие слова Домин, ибо тот, кто шутит со Смертью — шутит лишь раз.

traits.locale_text: The Undying One listened to the Enim's brazen words without a hint of a smile; for one who jokes with Death can do it but once.
The Undying One listened to the Enim's brazen words without a hint of a smile; for one who jokes with Death can do it but once.
The Undying One listened to the Enim's brazen words without a hint of a smile; for one who jokes with Death can do so but once.

The Undying One listened to the Domin's brazen words without a hint of a smile; for one who taunts Death can do so but once.
The Undying One listened to the Domin's brazen words without a hint of a smile; for one who taunts Death can do so but once.

languages.text: Der Todlose lauschte den kühnen Worten {mf|des|der} Domin ohne den geringsten Anflug eines Lächelns. Denn wer den Tod verspottet, tut dies nur einmal.
languages.original_text: The Undying One listened to the Domin's brazen words without a hint of a smile; for one who taunts Death can do so but once.

traits.locale_text: Der Todlose lauschte den kühnen Worten {mf|des|der} Domin ohne den geringsten Anflug eines Lächelns. Denn wer den Tod verspottet, tut dies nur einmal.

languages.text: El Inmortal escuchó las osadas palabras de{mf|l| la} Domin sin esbozar siquiera una sonrisa, pues quien provoca a la Muerte solo puede hacerlo una vez.
languages.original_text: The Undying One listened to the Domin's brazen words without a hint of a smile; for one who taunts Death can do so but once.

traits.locale_text: El Inmortal escuchó las osadas palabras de{mf|l| la} Domin sin esbozar siquiera una sonrisa, pues quien provoca a la Muerte solo puede hacerlo una vez.

languages.text: 不死の者は、ほほ笑むことすらなく、ドミンの生意気な言葉に耳を傾けた。死を愚弄するものがそうできるのは一度きりなのだから。
languages.original_text: The Undying One listened to the Domin's brazen words without a hint of a smile; for one who taunts Death can do so but once.

traits.locale_text: 不死の者は、ほほ笑むことすらなく、エニムの生意気な言葉に耳を傾けた。死を愚弄するものがそうできるのは一度きりなのだから。

languages.text: 不死之神聆听着秘者厚颜无耻的发言，没有露出一丝笑容，因为嘲弄死亡之人不会有第二次机会。
languages.original_text: The Undying One listened to the Domin's brazen words without a hint of a smile; for one who taunts Death can do so but once.

traits.locale_text: 不死之神聆听着秘者厚颜无耻的发言，没有露出一丝笑容，因为嘲弄死亡之人不会有第二次机会。

languages.text: L'Immortel écouta {mf|le|la} Domin sans esquisser le moindre sourire, car celui qui raille la Mort ne peut le faire qu'une seule fois.
languages.original_text: The Undying One listened to the Domin's brazen words without a hint of a smile; for one who taunts Death can do so but once.

traits.locale_text: L'Immortel écouta {mf|le|la} Domin sans esquisser le moindre sourire, car celui qui raille la Mort ne peut le faire qu'une seule fois.

languages.text: Ölmeyen, yüzünde en ufak bir gülümseme bile belirmeden Domin'in coşkulu sözlerini dinledi. Çünkü Ölüm'e laf eden birisi, yaptığını asla tekrarlayamazdı.
languages.original_text: The Undying One listened to the Domin's brazen words without a hint of a smile; for one who taunts Death can do so but once.
